exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface lltsi : leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface eewci : every_entry_was_created_interface llcei : leaderLogs_candidate_entries_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface vci : votes_correct_interface net, net' : network gd : GhostSimulations.ghost_data d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output h : Net.name d' : raft_data H : reboot d = d' H0 : forall (leader : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) H1 : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : nwState net h = (gd, d) H3 : forall h' : Net.name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h' H4 : nwPackets net = nwPackets net' leader : Net.name t : term ll : list entry e : entry h0 : Net.name H5 : type (snd (nwState net' leader)) = Leader H6 : In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net' h0))) H7 : In e ll H8 : eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net' leader)) The term "one_node_params" has type "OneNodeParams orig_base_params" while it is expected to have type "network".

exceptions.tactic: apply H0 with (leader := leader) (t := t) (ll := ll) (e := e) (h := h); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface lsi : leader_sublog_interface lltsi : leaderLogs_term_sanity_interface eewci : every_entry_was_created_interface llcei : leaderLogs_candidate_entries_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface vci : votes_correct_interface net, net' : network gd : electionsData d : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output h : name d' : raft_data H : reboot d = d' H0 : forall (leader : name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (e : entry) (h : name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> In e ll -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) H1 : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net H2 : nwState net h = (gd, d) H3 : forall h' : name, nwState net' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d') h' H4 : nwPackets net = nwPackets net' leader : name t : term ll : list entry e : entry h0 : name H5 : type (snd (nwState net' leader)) = Leader H6 : In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net' h0))) H7 : In e ll H8 : eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net' leader)) H9 : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_sublog net Unable to unify "In e (log (snd (nwState net leader)))" with "In e (log (snd (nwState net' leader)))".

original: intros. unfold refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot in *. unfold leaderLogs_sublog in *. intros. specialize (leaderLogs_sublog_invariant one_node_params raft_params net). unfold leaderLogs_sublog_invariant in *. intros. apply H0 with (leader := leader) (t := t) (ll := ll) (e := e) (h := h); auto.
